description.displayText: Brittany is great.  She knew how to connect with our 4yo and 2yo, and was incredibly creative in keeping them engaged and learning throughout the day (with stories, questions and answers, little games, etc.).  She was at ease even when they posed challenges (e.g. one wants to go "left" and the other wants to go "right"), and patiently found solutions, knowing when to "go with the flow" and also when to push back.  We would definitely hire her again.
description.originalText: Brittany is great.
